articles.author: Joshua Franklin, Patrick McGee
articles.title: Apple and Goldman offer US savings account with 4.15% annual interest - Financial Times
articles.description: Product launched as depositors pull cash from bank accounts offering low returns
articles.content:
Apple and Goldman Sachs are seeking to lure US depositors to a new savings account by offering to pay interest at more than 10 times the national average rate. 
The California tech giant and Wall St… [+2306 chars]

articles.author: Susanne Barton, Tom Metcalf
articles.title: Barclays to Cut More Than 100 Investment Banking Roles, Sky Says - Bloomberg
articles.description: Barclays Plc will cut about 100 roles in its investment banking group, as the slowdown in dealmaking and capital-markets businesses continues.
articles.content:
Barclays Plc will cut about 100 roles in its investment banking group, as the slowdown in dealmaking and capital-markets businesses continues.
